mapper.select: select nu.id as notificationMessageId,n.icon as notificationMessageLogo,n.title as notificationMessageTitle, nu.create_date as notificationMessageDate ,n.content as notificationMessageContent ,n.type as notificationMessageType, n.type_id as notificationMessageContentId,nu.status as notificationMessageStatus from remind n inner join remind_user nu on n.id=nu.remind_id where nu.sys_elder_user_id=#{sysElderUserID} limit #{limit}

select nu.id as notificationMessageId,n.icon as notificationMessageLogo,n.title as notificationMessageTitle, nu.create_date as notificationMessageDate ,n.content as notificationMessageContent,n.type as notificationMessageType, n.type_id as notificationMessageContentId,nu.status as notificationMessageStatus from remind n inner join remind_user nu on n.id=nu.remind_id where nu.id=#{ID}
